samples.instruction: Oruthan kadan vaangittu thirumba tharala, enna panradhu? (Chennai style)
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Written reminder anuppunga, 2) Legal notice (registered post), 3) Response illa = court case. Evidence: Cheque/transfer proof, WhatsApp messages, witnesses. Rs.20 lakh-kkul: Summary suit (faster). Criminal: Cheque bounce aana Section 138 case. Limitation: 3 years. Pro tip: Promissory note vaangiyirundhaa strong case.

samples.instruction: False FIR à®ªà¯‹à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®¾à®²à¯ à®à®©à¯à®© à®†à®•à¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output: IPC 182 (BNS 213): False information to public servant - 6 months imprisonment + fine. IPC 211 (BNS 248): False charge with intent to injure - 2-7 years imprisonment. Defamation case-à®‰à®®à¯ à®µà®°à¯à®®à¯. Accused can file counter case. Think twice before filing.

samples.instruction: Maternity leave rights ennenna?
samples.current_output: Maternity Benefit Act 2017: 1) 26 weeks paid leave (first 2 children), 2) 12 weeks (3rd child onwards), 3) 12 weeks (adoption/surrogacy), 4) Work from home option (post leave), 5) Creche facility (50+ employees). Cannot terminate during pregnancy/leave. ESI: Maternity benefit through ESI if covered. Miscarriage: 6 weeks leave.

samples.instruction: Legal notice à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®…à®©à¯à®ªà¯à®ªà¯à®µà®¤à¯? Lawyer à®µà¯‡à®£à¯à®®à®¾?

Format: 1) From/To addresses, 2) Subject, 3) Facts, 4) Legal grounds, 5) Demand/relief sought, 6) Time limit (usually 15-30 days), 7) Consequence warning. Send: Registered post AD (Acknowledgement Due). Keep copy + postal receipt. Reply not mandatory but advisable.

samples.instruction: Builder pona loan EMI kattikittu irukken, possession tharala - enna option?

samples.instruction: Cyber stalking-kku enna law irukku?
samples.current_output: IPC 354D (stalking) - 3 years imprisonment (first offence), 5 years (repeat). IT Act 66D (cheating by personation). Evidence collect: Screenshots, call logs, messages. Platform block + police complaint. Women: Protection order under DV Act-um peralaam.

samples.instruction: Misleading advertisement-kku complaint podalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. ASCI (Advertising Standards Council of India)-kku complaint podalam - ascionline.in. Consumer forum-lum case podalam. Celebrity endorsement false claims-kkum celebrity liable. Compensation + advertisement withdraw order kidaikkum.

samples.instruction: SIM swap fraud-la irundhu eppadi protect panradhu?
samples.current_output: Prevention: 1) SIM lock enable, 2) Don't share personal details, 3) Unusual network loss-kku alert, 4) Bank OTP to email (if available). If happened: Telecom provider + bank + police immediately. New SIM block request pannunga.

samples.instruction: Birth certificate illai - late registration eppadi?

samples.instruction: RTI reply ethanai naalil kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: Normal: 30 days. Life/liberty matter: 48 hours. Third party information: 40 days. Transfer to other department: 35 days (5 days transfer + 30 days). Reply illaattal deemed refusal - First Appeal podalam.

samples.current_output: Consumer Protection Act 2019-in keezh 6 mukkiya rights: 1) Safety right - unsafe products-la irundhu protection, 2) Information right - product details therinjukka, 3) Choice right - alternatives select seyya, 4) Hearing right - complaint kodukka, 5) Redressal right - compensation pera, 6) Education right - consumer awareness.

samples.instruction: Theft vs Robbery à®à®©à¯à®© à®µà®¿à®¤à¯à®¤à®¿à®¯à®¾à®šà®®à¯?
samples.current_output: Theft (IPC 379/BNS 303): Secretly taking property - 3 years imprisonment. Robbery (IPC 392/BNS 309): Theft + force/fear - 10 years imprisonment. Dacoity (5+ persons): 10 years to life. House breaking: Additional charges. Recovery of property possible.
